Articles.Content: I offer a challenge to any1 that can get past 001085k. I wont tell you how i did it but here is a picture of my limit reached.
Erm, you can hit escape velocity with a relatively small rocket using only stock parts...
Not to pewp on yur faic, but 1mil meers isn't alot for stock parts... Especially since it took 20 minutes...
@rulerofnothing just staight up. @Tim_Barrett I'm working on getting more parts for this game which is very fun and addicting.

@rulerofnothing just staight up. @Tim_Barrett I'm working on getting more parts for this game which is very fun and addicting.

No I meant that the height is low-ish for stock parts.
ah, sorry should have known what you were takling about. lol. For stock parts im supprised on how far you can get, I'm past 00800k and it's scary. A

ah, sorry should have known what you were takling about. lol. For stock parts im supprised on how far you can get, I'm past 00800k and it's scary. Are the other parts better like the boosters stronger?
A lot of the mod parts are bigger or better than the stock ones in various ways. More fuel, more thrust, lighter, whatever.

A lot of the mod parts are bigger or better than the stock ones in various ways. More fuel, more thrust, lighter, whatever.

Not neccesarily, equalized mod packs are great when it comes to ratios, like a modded part will have the same fuel intake, but more thrust and more weight.
There IS a screenshot function you know...

Not neccesarily, equalized mod packs are great when it comes to ratios, like a modded part will have the same fuel intake, but more thrust and more weight.

As I said, bigger and better in various ways. All depends on what you're trying to do.
On stock parts I slowed down so I could reach my orbit of 8000 km
